column1:
Paski,"2010-03-15T16:17:28.577Z","Essential for building houses","

This old supplementary set is probably the most intensively used supplementary set I have. It consists of:

The basic building sets from that time, like 515 and 520, came with a few roof pieces, but there were never enough to build an entire roof of a house. I could always build the walls, but I did not have the pieces to build the roof. After I got this set, I could finally do that.
The parts selection is great and well-balanced. To build a more serious sized house you will probably need 3 of 4 of these sets though.

I know this is not a model, but these type of sets really stimulated my creativity as a child - and provided the most fun, actually. I would highly recommend parents to get these type of sets for their children.
• A set of pieces you usually don't have enough from
